title: Remote Health Monitoring Dashboard
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want access to a comprehensive dashboard that displays real-time health metrics for my patients so that I can efficiently monitor their well-being and respond quickly to any changes.

title: Health Data Alert Customization
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to customize alert settings for health metrics so that I receive notifications tailored to specific health concerns for my patients.

title: Care Task Progress Tracking
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to track the progress of care tasks assigned to my patients so that I can ensure timely completion and accountability.

title: Secure User Consent Management
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want older adults to easily manage and revoke consent for data sharing so that I can ensure their privacy preferences are respected while providing care.

title: Quick Access to Emergency Information
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want quick access to emergency contact information and critical health data so that I can respond effectively in urgent situations.

title: Integrated Communication Tools
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want integrated communication tools in ALFRED so that I can effectively interact with my patients through messaging and video calls, ensuring their social connection and timely support.
